content.rendered:
ABSTRACT & FULL PAPER SUBMISSION

Publish in IEEE Xplore Digital Library

1. Prospective authors are invited to submit original full papers WITHOUT authors’ names and affiliations, in English, of 4-6 pages in standard IEEE two-column format only, reporting their original work and results, applications, and/or implementation in one or more of the listed areas.

2. Papers must be submitted online only through the submission system of the conference website.

3. At least one author of each accepted paper MUST register and present the paper at the conference in order that the paper is to be included in the program. The program will also be submitted for inclusion in the IEEE Xplore (Conference ID : 63212X).

4. For the full paper, these templates should be used for submitting in full papers for oral session: Microsoft word 2003 (A4) , Latex

Publish in e-Conference Proceedings

Papers to be published in the Conference Proceedings with ISBN identifier

1. The length of the full papers must be between 6 to 8 pages A4 pages in length.

2. The manuscript should consist of original research that has not been previously published or submitted for publication elsewhere in any other form or language.

3. Each manuscript will be reviewed by a minimum of two reviewers (the double-blind peer review).

4. MS-Word template for preparation manuscript – MS-Word Template
